SELECT BOARD_NO, /*게시글 번호*/ BOARD_TITLE, /*게시판 제목*/ BOARD_CONTENT, /*게시글 내용*/ STATUS, /*게시여부*/ BOARD_VIEW_COUNT as BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, /*게시판 조회수*/ BOARD_TYPE, NOTICE_STATUS, /*공지여부상태*/ TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as CREATE_DATE, /*작성 날짜*/ TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as UPDATE_DATE, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = MEMBER_NO /* 멤버(관리자)테이블*/ AND ROWNUM = 1) AS NICKNAME,
(SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_ATTACHMENT WHERE FILE_NO = FILE_NO AND ROWNUM = 1) AS FILE_PATH
FROM TB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 'B' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_TYPE, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARDNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, #{status}, 1, #{boardType}, #{filePath} )
INSERT INTO TB_ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILENO.NEXTVAL, 'WEPLAY_SOCCER01.jpg', 'WEPLAY_SOCCER02.jpg', #{filePath} )
